app.title: Sudoku Solver
app.siteTitle: Sudoku Solver | Free Online Tool Supporting Multiple Solutions
app.description: A free online Sudoku solver. Handles puzzles with multiple solutions, displaying the total number of possible solutions and a complete list of all solutions.
